text: The women's 'Hard Styles with Weapons' category involved thirteen contestants from eight countries across two continents - Europe and North America. Each contestant went through seven performances (2 minutes each) with the totals added up at the end of the event. The gold medal winner was Veronika Dombrovskaya from Belarus with compatriot Maria Pekarchik gaining silver. Ekaterina Chizhikova from Russia claimed the bronze medal spot. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Position ! Contestant ! 1 ! 2 ! 3 ! 4 ! 5 ! 6 ! 7 !
